quick_donation.snippet: Make a one-time donation to a listed school or campaign. Select amount and pay via UPI, net banking, or card.

campaigns.snippet: Schools can publish donation campaigns. Each campaign shows target amount, raised amount, donors list, and progress bar.

post_campaign.snippet: Registered schools can create new campaigns by providing photos, description, target amount, and duration.

impact_reports.snippet: Campaign owners must upload quarterly usage reports so donors can see how funds were spent, including photos and receipts.

tax_benefits.snippet: All donations qualify for 80G tax exemption. Donors can download their receipts from their donation history.

register_school.snippet: Underprivileged schools can apply for onboarding by submitting school registration details, documents, and photos.

donor_history.snippet: Donors can view all past donations, download receipts, and track impact updates for each campaign they contributed to.
